update KBS_ARTICLE
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KBS_ARTICLE ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_ARTICLE WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_ARTICLE WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE > CREATION_DATE ORDER BY ID LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
